<!-- Generated by Harlequin Webmaker 2.1.3; Transducer 1.0.2 --> <HTML> <HEAD> <TITLE> Elisha Sacks</TITLE> </HEAD> <BODY> <IMG SRC="images/eps.gif"><P> <H1> Elisha Sacks</H1> <IMG SRC="goldRule.gif" width =100%> <P> <EM> Associate Professor of Computer Sciences (1994)</EM><P> <EM> Ph.D., computer science, Massachusetts Institute of Technology, 1988</EM><P> Dr. Sacks's research interests are scientific and engineering problem solving, geometric reasoning, and artificial intelligence. Dr. Sacks is the <A HREF="http://www.cs.purdue.edu/visctr/">Director of the Visualization Center</A>. <P> <i>Projects:</i> <UL> <li> <A HREF="../research/cciadv.html">Center for Computational Image Analysis and Data Visualization</a> <li> <A HREF="../research/kinematics2.html">Computer-aided Mechanical Design Research</A> <li> <A HREF="../research/CAD.html">Mechanical CAD Project</a> <li> <A HREF="../research/spcoso.html">Spatial Constraint Solving</A> <li> <A HREF="../research/jointmod.html">Joint Modeling</A> </UL> <P> <A HREF="../publications/eps.html">Recent Publications</a> <P> <P> <A HREF="http://www.cs.purdue.edu/people/eps"> Personal Homepage</A><P> <IMG SRC="goldRule.gif" width =100%> </BODY> </HTML> </HTML>
